Articles.Content:
![2WImeqs.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/2WImeqs.jpg?1)

Hello ladies and gentlemen I am DrNickdoom and welcome to Beat Say Goodbye

Will 1.0 around the corner (by the time you're reading this email even be out) I thought I have to jump back into the beta and give it a last hurrah. And what better way to do that then starting a new LP and using some Mods that i have been meaning to try out. 

Namely:

Kerbal Construction Time [bit.do/KerbalConstructionTime](http://bit.do/KerbalConstructionTime)

Kerbal Engineer [bit.do/KerbalEngineer](http://bit.do/KerbalEngineer)

and 

kOS [bit.do/kOS](http://bit.do/kOS)

( feel free to suggest more mods )

I'll be the first to say I am no expert when it comes to kerbal space program, and I have probably already forgotten more about the game then I currently know, but this is where you come in while I'm recording I stream to twitch and I endeavour to reply to every single youtube comment and with you in twitch chat or commenting on video I'll have a wealth of knowledge of which I can learn from( I will need it)

I will try to give as much notice I can stream and post to the livestream calendar of the site and I'll be loving one tv half hour episode a day.

I'd like to thank you for taking the time to read this and say I hope you enjoyed content

Link to playlist [http://bit.do/BSG](http://bit.do/BSG)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MOAM6MSZWaI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
